de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Interface TypeAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArcAdapter, ChainAdapter, SpanAdapter

    public interface TypeAdapter
    Type Adapters for span, arc, and chain annotations
    Author:
    Richard Eckart de Castilho, Seid Muhie Yimam

    • Method Detail

      • automate

        void automate(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJcas,
              AnnotationFeature feature,
              List<String> labelValues)
       throws BratAnnotationException,
              IOException
        Add new annotation to the CAS using the MIRA prediction. This is different from the add methods in the TypeAdapters in such a way that the begin and end offsets are always exact so that no need to re-compute
        Parameters:
        aJcas - the JCas.
        feature - the feature.
        labelValues - the values.
        Throws:
        BratAnnotationException - if the annotations could not be created/updated.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • updateFeature

        void updateFeature(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJcas,
                   AnnotationFeature feature,
                   int address,
                   String value)
        Update this feature with a new value
        Parameters:
        aJcas - the JCas.
        feature - the feature.
        address - the annotation ID.
        value - the value.

      • render

        void render(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJcas,
            List<AnnotationFeature> features,
            GetDocumentResponse aResponse,
            BratAnnotatorModel aBratAnnotatorModel,
            ColoringStrategy aColoringStrategy)
        Add annotations from the CAS, which is controlled by the window size, to the brat response GetDocumentResponse
        Parameters:
        aJcas - The JCAS object containing annotations
        features - the features.
        aResponse - A brat response containing annotations in brat protocol
        aBratAnnotatorModel - Data model for brat annotations
        aColoringStrategy - the coloring strategy to render this layer
